title: I'm A Cute Christian
itunes:title: I'm A Cute Christian
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley I am a 32 year old newly divorced mom of a one year old. I haven’t dated in a long time, so I decided to join an online Christian dating site instead of suffering through blind dates and meeting losers whenever I’m out with my girlfriends. I have been on the Christian dating site a few months and I met a nice 39 year old man. We’ve been chatting and talking for the last month. We have exchanged several pictures since we met and he has yet to compliment me on my looks. I am not sure if there is a physical attraction for him because he hasn’t said anything................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
